name: Thief of Hearts - A Juno Steel Dating Simulator
name_original: Thief of Hearts - A Juno Steel Dating Simulator
description:
We are a team of fans of the Penumbra Podcast, making this game for fun and no profit. All characters and locations within the game are the property of Kevin Vibert and Sophie Kaner.

This game is free, but if you wish to contribute to our incredible team feel free to donate to the links below. 

Pippin Truman - Marbles Hansen - MxCosmic - Acadieum - WildfireWhim
Oliver Leamon

Full details of credits and team members can be found here but be warned it may contain spoilers for parts of the game you haven’t encountered yet!

Tag your posts with #tohtpp or @thiefofheartstpp with your reactions, thoughts- rest assured, the team are as excited to see you playing the game as you are to play it!
